help.title: â“ Help
help.text:
**How to use:**
1. Send a file to the bot
2. Select conversion format
3. Select quality (for video/images)
4. Wait for processing
5. Receive the converted file

**ğŸ“¦ Batch processing:**
â€¢ Send multiple files as album (up to 10)
â€¢ All files will be converted simultaneously
â€¢ Supports video, photos, documents

**Supported formats:**

ğŸ“¹ **Video:** MP4, AVI, MKV, MOV, WMV, FLV, WEBM
ğŸµ **Audio:** MP3, WAV, FLAC, AAC, OGG, M4A
ğŸ–¼ **Images:** JPG, PNG, WEBP, GIF, TIFF, HEIC, HEIF
ğŸ“„ **Documents:** PDF, DOCX, TXT, MD

**Limits:**
â€¢ Free: 3 conv./day, up to 20 MB
â€¢ Subscription: 100 conv./day, up to 200 MB
